seo.Main Title: INMERGERS - Innovative Platform for International Investment
seo.Home Description: INMERGERS - Innovative Platform for International Investment, Foundation for M&A Transactions in the new ERA 4.0
seo.Not permission login: You do not have permission to log in to the system

home.title: Home page
home.Choose your type: Choose your type to register on the portal and get increase your search by 10x
home.Seller profiles on INMERGERS: Seller profiles on INMERGERS include profiles of businesses and projects for sale or raising funds, profiles of trademark owners and OEMs.
home.Buyer profiles on INMERGERS: Buyer profiles on INMERGERS include institutional investors, individual investors, and investment funds.
home.Market that INMERGERS: The market that INMERGERS launched initially and has plans to expand in the future
home.INMERGERS provides: INMERGERS provides a completely free business valuation tool that uses a discounted cash flow formula to help businesses and investors get useful reference information in the decision to buy,sell or invest.
home.Results: Results are completely dependent on the input data provided by the user.
home.Therefore: Therefore,the user is solely responsible for the information they provide when using the Tool as well as the decisions made based on the results received from the Tool.
home.It is a long established: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page

about_us.After more: After more than 10 years working in the field of investment consulting and M&A consulting for both domestic and foreign businesses, we realize that there are many problems of customers that the market cannot completely solve. In particular, approaching the suitable projects and partners is always a big challenge.
about_us.INMERGERS was created: That is the reason INMERGERS was created.
about_us.Being able to reduce: Being able to reduce costs and time to find partners by up to 10 times compared to traditional methods, INMERGERS aims to become an effective international technology platform to support customers with M&A or franchising quickly, securely and optimally.
about_us.Investors wishing: Investors wishing to partially or fully invest into a business
about_us.become commercial: Buyers wishing to become commercial agents
about_us.Enterprises and individuals: Enterprises /individuals wishing to buy/ to lease assets
about_us.Businesses are looking: Businesses are looking for Original Equipment Manufacturer
about_us.Companies want to: Companies owners want to fully/ partially sell their businesses
about_us.their shares: Companies want to sell their shares
about_us.Companies want to sell: Companies owners want to fully/ partially sell their businesses
about_us.Inmergers brings up: Inmergers brings up opportunities on a global scale
about_us.Inmergers has a strong development: Inmergers has a strong development team and unique features
about_us.INMERGERS builds a partner: INMERGERS builds a partner system through BNI, an organization presents in 72 countries, especially in Japan, Korea, Singapore, ... Entrepreneurs can remove geographical obstacles and implement connections around the world.
about_us.Thanks to this system: Thanks to this system, the number of buyers and sellers on the platform is unlimited.
about_us.INMERGERS was built: INMERGERS was built and developed with the goal of minimizing the time and costs of the seller and the buyer to connect in mergers, acquisitions, franchising/agency deals. With different features:
about_us.Auto-matching - Features: Auto-matching - Features that automatically send users the information of profiles that match their needs.
about_us.The business valuation: The business valuation tool uses reliable algorithms and data sources to help users access to valuable information in M&A transactions.
about_us.Profiles information: Profiles information are kept confidential until connections are made.
about_us.INMERGERS points: INMERGERS points can be exchange for service packages.
about_us.Lawyer with 10 years of experience in M&: Lawyer with 10 years of experience in M&A consulting and 15 years of Market Research experience, in charge of developing business and marketing strategies.
about_us.Master of Business Administration with m: Master of Business Administration with more than 20 years of experience in finance and business administration and management.
about_us.An expert with more than 10 years of exp: An expert with more than 10 years of experience in e-commerce system development and over 5 years of crypto currencies investment.
about_us.President of Glocal Solution Japan, stra: President of Glocal Solution Japan, strategic partner of INMERGERS in Japan.
about_us.Founder and Managing Partner of Messrs S: Founder and Managing Partner of Messrs Sim & Rahman, strategic partner in Malaysia.
about_us.Director of Ingeeniuum Advisors Private: Director of Ingeeniuum Advisors Private Limited, strategic partner of INMERGERS in India.

profile.Both: Both parties are encouraged to conduct all assessments before making offers on INMERGERS. Clearly demonstrate assets for sale and expectations through messages on INMERGERS before making an offer. The proposal, though not binding on either party, should be considered a serious investigation.

seller_profile_public.EBITDA: EBITDA (Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation and Amortization) margin provides an investor information regarding the core operating profitability of a company. This is a financial metrics commonly used to compare valuations in most industries. EBITDA varies from industry to industry and company to company.
seller_profile_public.The physical: The physical assets include equipment, plants and machineries, furniture, buildings and properties if owned by the company. It does not include intangible assets such as patents/IP/trademarks, brand value, etc

privacy.Thông tin: Member Information on Inmergers.com is strictly confidential in accordance with Inmergers.com's Member Information privacy policy. The collection and use of each Member's Member Information is done only with the consent of that Member, unless otherwise provided for by law.
privacy.InMergers: InMergers undertakes not to use, transfer, provide or disclose to any third party a Member's Member Information without the consent of the Member, except for some necessary activities. mentioned in the content Persons/organizations with access to Member Information.
privacy.Trong trường hợp: In the event that the server hosting the Member Information is hacked by a hacker leading to the loss of the Member's personal data, Inmergers.com will be responsible for reporting the incident and coordinating with the authorities to check. , promptly handle and notify the Member.
privacy.Ban quản trị: The Management Board of Inmergers.com requires individuals, when registering as a Member, to provide full Member Information and take legal responsibility for the above Member Information. The Administration of Inmergers.com is not responsible for and will not settle any claims related to the interests of that Member if you find that the Member Information provided during initial registration is incorrect.

company_valuation.In M&A deals: In M&A deals, the valuation is important in helping parties make decisions and often takes a lot of time, effort and cost before the parties reach a consensus on the value of the business needs pricing.
company_valuation.INMERGERS: INMERGERS provides a completely free business valuation tool that uses a discounted cash flow formula to help businesses and investors get useful reference information in the decision to buy, sell or invest.
company_valuation.Results: Results are completely dependent on the input data provided by the user. Therefore, the user is solely responsible for the information they provide when using the Tool as well as the decisions made based on the results received from the Tool
company_valuation.Please: Please provide actual information for the most accurate results
company_valuation.Capital contribution ratio corresponding: Capital contribution ratio corresponding to the investment

terms_of-use.Thành viên cam kết những thông tin cung: Members undertake that the information provided to Inmergers.com and the information posted to Inmergers.com is accurate and complete. When there are changes or additions to the information on Inmergers.com, the Member commits that these changes and supplements are up to date, accurate and complete.
terms_of-use.CÁC ĐIỀU KHOẢN VÀ ĐIỀU KIỆN SỬ DỤNG DỊCH: TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF USE OF SERVICES ON E-TRADE FLOORING INMERGERS.COM
terms_of-use.là sàn giao dịch thương mại điện tử do C: is an e-commerce trading floor owned and operated by INMERGERS Joint Stock Company.
terms_of-use.hay “Bên cung cấp dịch vụ” là Công ty Cổ: or “Service Provider” means INMERGERS Joint Stock Company established and operating under the Business Registration Certificate No. 0109232418 issued for the first time by the Department of Planning and Investment of Hanoi City on June 23, 2018. 2020, third amendment dated 14/01/2021.
terms_of-use.hay “Bên sử dụng dịch vụ” bao gồm Bên mu: or “Service User” includes Buyer, Seller, Franchisee/agent, Broker, recognized as a member on Inmergers.com and authorized to use services provided by Inmergers.com to the extent permitted by Inmergers.com. Through Inmergers.com, Members create profiles, exchange information directly to proceed with transactions outside of Inmergers.com. Member Information is obtained from that account and profile.
terms_of-use.Điều 2: Quyền và nghĩa vụ của Thành viên: Article 2: Rights and obligations of Members
terms_of-use.Khi đăng ký trở thành Thành viên của Inm: When registering to become a Member of Inmergers.com, the Member will be created an account to participate in performing activities on Inmergers.com.
terms_of-use.Được đội ngũ của Inmergers.com hướng dẫn: Be guided by the Inmergers.com team to use the tools and features for account management and use the features on Inmergers.com
terms_of-use.Được tự do lựa chọn và sử dụng các tính: You are free to choose and use the features and service packages on Inmergers.com to suit your goals and desires.
terms_of-use.Có quyền giới thiệu thông tin doanh nghi: Have the right to introduce business information, business cooperation opportunities, access to an accurate and reliable information system and connect with other businesses, investors, brokers, support for the business. investment, business, mergers and acquisitions...
terms_of-use.Được hưởng các chính sách giành cho khác: Enjoy the policies for customers that Inmergers.com has built, such as information privacy policy... and use all the features and support services that Inmergers.com provides in calling services. service selected by the Member.
terms_of-use.Cung cấp đầy đủ các thông tin mà Inmerge: Provide all the information that Inmergers.com requires about individuals, organizations and legal entities registering for an account. Ensure the truthfulness, accuracy and responsibility for the information provided to Inmergers.com.
terms_of-use.Tuân thủ các quy định về về thanh toán,: Comply with regulations on payment, protection of intellectual property rights, protection of consumer rights and other relevant laws when using the service and posting information on Inmergers.com .
terms_of-use.Thành viên tự chịu trách nhiệm về bảo mậ: Members are solely responsible for the security, storage and use of the service under their registered name and email box. Members are responsible for promptly notifying Inmergers.com of unauthorized use, abuse, breach of security... for the two parties to cooperate in handling.
terms_of-use.Thành viên tự chịu trách nhiệm về nội du: Members are solely responsible for the content, images and other information as well as the entire transaction process with partners on Inmergers.com. Transactions between the parties (if any) will take place outside the scope of Inmergers.com and are subject to the will of the parties. Inmergers.com is not responsible for any transactions, disputes, damages arising out of or in connection with activities between members on Inmergers.com.
terms_of-use.Thành viên cam kết, đồng ý không sử dụng: Members commit and agree not to use Inmergers.com's services for illegal, unreasonable, fraudulent, threatening, illegal information exploration, destruction, creation and distribution purposes. viruses that damage the system, configuration, transmission of information of Inmergers.com or use its services for the purpose of speculating, manipulating the market to create fake offers, including serving to judge demand market demand. In case of violations, members must be responsible for their actions before the law.
terms_of-use.Thành viên cam kết không được thay đổi,: Members undertake not to change, modify, copy, transmit, distribute, provide and create similar tools of the service provided by Inmergers.com to a third party without prior consent. by Inmergers.com.
terms_of-use.Thành viên không được hành động gây mất: Members may not act to discredit Inmergers.com in any form such as causing disunity among Members by using a second registered name, through a third party or propagating or disseminating such information. information that is not conducive to the reputation of Inmergers.com
terms_of-use.Tôn trọng quyền sở hữu trí tuệ của Inmer: Respect the intellectual property rights of Inmergers.com and other products and services of Inmergers.com; do not arbitrarily change the name, image, and elements related to the trademarks of Inmergers.com anywhere
terms_of-use.Không sao chép, tái tạo, tái xuất bản, t: Do not copy, reproduce, republish, upload, post, publicly display, encode, translate, transmit or distribute in any way any part/content of the website to any computer. computer, server, website or other means for publication or distribution or for any purpose, without the prior written consent of Inmergers.com.
terms_of-use.Không được sử dụng các thiết bị, chương: No other automated devices, programs, algorithms or methods, or any similar manual processes, may be used to access, collect, copy or monitor any content, materials, any documents or information from Inmergers.com.
terms_of-use.Điều 3: Quyền và nghĩa vụ của INMERGERS: Article 3: Rights and obligations of IMERGERS
terms_of-use.INMERGERS sẽ tiến hành cung cấp dịch vụ: INMERGERS will proceed to provide services to the Participating Members after completing the required procedures and conditions set forth by Inmergers.com.
terms_of-use.Từ chối đăng tải thông tin trong trường: Refuse to post information in case there is a basis to prove that the Member providing information to Inmergers.com is inaccurate, incomplete, violating the law, ethics, fine customs and traditions of Vietnam.
terms_of-use.Có thể chấm dứt quyền Thành viên và quyề: The Member's right to use and the right to use one or all of the services of the Member may be terminated in the event that the Member violates the Inmergers.com Regulations or engages in actions that affect business operations on Inmergers. com.
terms_of-use.INMERGERS sẽ giữ quyền sở hữu trí tuệ đố: InMergers undertakes not to use, transfer, provide or disclose to any third party a Member's Member Information without the consent of the Member, except for some necessary activities. mentioned in the content Persons/organizations with access to Member Information.
terms_of-use.Có trách nhiệm xây dựng, thực hiện cơ ch: Responsible for developing and implementing an inspection and monitoring mechanism to ensure that the provision of information on the e-commerce trading floor is carried out accurately and fully in accordance with the provisions of law.
terms_of-use.Tiến hành triển khai và hợp tác với các: Implement and cooperate with partners in building a system of services and utility tools for transactions of participating Members and users on Inmergers.com.
terms_of-use.Chịu trách nhiệm xây dựng, bổ sung hệ th: Responsible for building and supplementing a system of knowledge and information on: e-commerce operations, system of domestic and international commercial legal documents, foreign markets, as well as relevant news. in connection with the activities of Inmergers.com.
terms_of-use.Chịu trách nhiệm loại bỏ những thông tin: Be responsible for removing information that infringes intellectual property rights and other illegal information when detecting or receiving a well-grounded complaint about this information.
terms_of-use.Có biện pháp xử lý kịp thời khi phát hiệ: Take timely measures when detecting or receiving reports of illegal acts on Inmergers.com, and will assist state management agencies in investigating law violations, providing registration information, transaction history and other documents about the subject of illegal acts on Inmergers.com.
terms_of-use.Cố gắng đến mức cao nhất trong phạm vi v: Try to the best extent and conditions possible to maintain the normal operation of Inmergers.com and fix problems such as: technical problems of machines, software errors, internet connection system , personnel, social changes, natural disasters, power outages, decisions of state agencies or a related third party. However, if the above incidents occur beyond our control, are force majeure events that cause damage to the Member, then Inmergers.com is not jointly responsible.
terms_of-use.Công bố công khai cơ chế giải quyết các: Publicly publish the mechanism to resolve disputes arising in the transaction process on Inmergers.com, actively support customers to protect their legitimate rights and interests.
terms_of-use.Khi phát sinh tranh chấp, INMERGERS đề c: When a dispute arises, INMERGERS appreciates the solution of negotiation and conciliation between the parties in order to maintain the member's confidence in the service quality of Inmergers.com. INMERGERS will receive user complaints and transfer complaint content to Legal Department to provide specific solutions to assist users to resolve such dispute INMERGERS proactively resolves quickly and responds to complaint settlement results on the basis of Process settle disputes and complaints within 15 working days.
terms_of-use.INMERGERS chỉ tiếp nhận và giải quyết nh: INMERGERS only receives and resolves complaints and disputes between Inmergers.com and Members. Questions, complaints, disputes between members when performing transactions themselves will not be within the scope of the settlement competence.
terms_of-use.là tất cả các tình huống và sự kiện vượt: are all situations and events beyond our control including: War, riots, riots, acts of sabotage, strikes, strikes, Government laws or regulations change, fire, explosion or other unavoidable accidents, floods, storms, earthquakes or other unusual natural phenomena and directly affect the perform all or part of the obligations of this partnership agreement.
terms_of-use.Hai bên không phải chịu bất kỳ một trách: The two parties do not bear any responsibility if an incident causes unintended consequences in the cases specified in Article 5.1.
terms_of-use.Điều 6: Điều chỉnh Điều kiện và điều kho: Article 6: Adjustment of terms and conditions of service use
terms_of-use.INMERGERS giữ mọi quyền điều chỉnh nội d: INMERGERS reserves all rights to modify the content of these Terms and Conditions of Service. Any changes will be updated in detail at Inmergers.com. The Member's continued use of the service after these Terms and Conditions of Use have been amended shall mean that the Member has accepted such revised Terms and Conditions of Use.

dispute-resolution.Khi: When disputes and complaints arise, Inmergers.com highly recommends negotiating and mediation solutions between the parties in order to maintain Members' confidence in Inmergers.com's service quality. The settlement of disputes and complaints is carried out according to the following steps:
dispute-resolution.Thành viên: Members report directly to the Board of Directors via hotline 0963750192 / 0963550192 or email info@inmergers.com ;
dispute-resolution.Inmergers.com: Inmergers.com will receive the Member's complaints and transfer the complaint to the Legal Department to provide specific solutions to support the Member. Inmergers.com proactively resolves quickly and publishes complaint settlement results on the basis of issued policies within 15 working days;
dispute-resolution.Trong: In case the complaint is beyond the ability and jurisdiction of Inmergers.com to settle, the Management Board will request the Member to bring the case to the competent state agency for resolution according to the law. Inmergers.com respects and strictly implements the provisions of the law on protecting the interests of Members. All acts of fraud and fraud are condemned and all responsible before the law.
